title: Felicity Huffman and Eva Longoria reunite at the Golden Globes 2016
title_page: Felicity Huffman and Eva Longoria reunite at the Golden Globes 2016 | Daily Mail Online
text:
She may not have had her husband with her.
But at least Felicity Huffman bumped into one of her old 'Wives.
The 53-year-old arrived at the Golden Globes on Sunday night looking stunning beneath her new brunette locks.
Scroll down for video
Blondes don't have more fun: Felicity Huffman showed off her new brunette locks on the red carpet of the Golden Globes in LA on Sunday night
The actress walked the red carpet in a fabulous floor-length shimmering scarlet sequinned gown.
Felicity is nominated for her sixth Globe; this time for supporting actress in a TV series or movie, for her turn in American Crime.
Now in its second season, the anthology follows a different case each series, and has seen the actress play two different leading roles so far.
See more of the latest Golden Globes 2016 news, red carpet pictures and video updates
Lady in red: The actress walked the red carpet in a fabulous floor-length shimmering scarlet sequinned gown
She's up against Lady Gaga for American Horror Story, Sarah Haye for Flesh And Bone, Queen Latifah for Bessie and Kirsten Dunst for Fargo.
Huffman already has a Globe under her belt, having landed the Best Actress in a Motion Picture gong in 2006 for her role as a transgender woman in the independent film, Transamerica.
Half of all Felicity's nominations came for arguably her most famous TV role as Lynette Scavo in Desperate Housewives - and she had a mini reunion with her co-star Eva 'Gaby Solis' Longoria right there on the red carpet.
Reunion: The 53-year-old had a mini Desperate Housewives reunion with her co-star Eva 'Gaby Solis' Longoria right there on the red carpet
Fit: The Telenovela star showed off her ample asset in a gorgeous trailing white gown
The two-ladies might have gossiped about one another on-screen but they are clearly best of buds in real life as they shared a laugh together in the Instagram snap posted by Extra.
There was no sign of Felicity's husband of almost 20 years William H Macy on the night.
The actor is no stranger to the ceremony himself, having been nominated four times throughout his career - most recently last year for his lead role in Shameless - although he has yet to bag one.
